results.title: Statin use and mortality in patients with deep vein thrombosis. Data from the RIETE Registry.
results.text_hl: The 3-month risk of @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ in statin users was significantly lower than in non-users in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with upper-limb @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ (aHR: 0.81; 95%CI: 0.72-0.91), distal lower-limb @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ (aHR: 0.48; 95%CI: 0.32-0.72), or proximal lower-limb @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ (aHR: 0.69; 95%CI: 0.50-0.95), and in those receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (aHR: 0.73; 95%CI: 0.60-0.90), @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (aHR: 0.70; 95%CI: 0.59-0.85), or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (aHR: 0.47; 95%CI: 0.27-0.80).

citations.NLM: Siniscalchi C, Bikdeli B, Jiménez D, Suriñach JM, Demelo-Rodríguez P, Moustafa F, Gil-Díaz A, García-Ortega A, Bui HM, Monreal M, RIETE Investigators. Statin use and mortality in patients with deep vein thrombosis. Data from the RIETE Registry. Thromb Res. 2024 Feb 24;236():88-96. PMID: 38417300

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates deep vein thrombosis in rabbits by regulating the fibrinolytic system.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@deep vein thrombosis@@@ in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ by regulating the fibrinolytic system.

citations.NLM: Feng Y, Zhang F, Niu L, Zhang M. Simvastatin ameliorates deep vein thrombosis in rabbits by regulating the fibrinolytic system. Blood Coagul Fibrinolysis. 2016 Jul;27(5):531-41. PMID: 27273142

results.title: Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin during the resolution phase of experimentally formed venous thrombi.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ targets anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ pathways during the resolution phase of a @DISEASE_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombus@@@, providing a therapeutic potential in @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ resolution and @DISEASE_Post_Infectious_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D000094025 @@@post-thrombotic syndrome@@@ prevention.

citations.NLM: Feng Y, Lei B, Zhang F, Niu L, Zhang H, Zhang M. Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin during the resolution phase of experimentally formed venous thrombi. J Investig Med. 2017 Aug;65(6):999-1007. PMID: 28442532
